problem.p: If a funicular form is changed such that the span remains the same but the height of the form (or length of the cable) increases, how will the force in the cable be affected? Assume that the load remains the same.

choicegroup.label: If a funicular form is changed such that the span remains the same but the height of the form (or length of the cable) increases, how will the force in the cable be affected? Assume that the load remains the same.
choicegroup.choice: The force in the cable will increase
The force in the cable will decrease
The force in the cable will remain the same

div.p: As the cable becomes closer to vertical, the force decreases.
